cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with secret sharing schemes, which are commonly studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR) communities. The paper also involves the use of algebraic geometric codes, which are a topic of interest in coding theory (cs.CC). The study of the relative generalized Hamming weights of the codes is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the information leakage of the schemes, which is a topic in security and privacy (cs.SI).
